idea:
We at, SanjeevaneTatva Chemicals are the Marketing arm of number of chemical manufacturers and custom synthesis laboratories in India. We specialise in marketing and exports of;

· Pharmaceutical Intermediates

· Agricultural Chemicals

· Water-treatment Chemicals

· Colour Pigments, etc

So, we would like to know, what are your requirements of chemicals that you need on a regular basis or otherwise.

We follow a simple objective of delivering Quality products and Trust in our association. SanjeevaneTatva team works with passion.
name: SANJEEVANETATVA CHEMICALS LLP

idea:
LEVELUP LOGISTICS LLP is  an International Freight & Logistics company handling Sea / Air Freight business.

Backed by a group of experienced professionals and good relationship with Shipping Lines, Airlines, Customs, AIR & SEA Port Authority, we smoothly handle your cargo movement with utmost efficiency. We want to be the ideal partner for all companies - a partner that has no geographical boundaries and which can meet all forwarding and logistics requirements.
name: LEVELUP LOGISTICS LLP

idea: Stree Sanman is a startup with a passion for solving Period Poverty. We sell or rent the Vending machines to improve accessibility of sanitary products. Smokeless Incinerator burns the soiled napkin and reduces carbon emission by electrolyte process. We are also developing a mobile app to track these machines and predict the next menstruation date with AI. We are a small team divided into manufacturing unit & sales team, and expanding a technical team and health experts.
name: STREE SANMAN PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
SINDHI BUSINESS NETWORKING FOUNDATION OF INDIA, providing services to the new start up business and create a plat form for new business entities to run business smoothly and efficiently ,

 

Every individuals starts business but worried about registration, licences and , finances, manpower and statutory compliance requirement

 

We will help them to get registered as business entity, providing required consultancy to get finances, investors and manpower and also help them to comply with statutory requirements.

 

Businessman starts business but don’t know how to manage it  as per quality standard which minimizes cost, and time. We providing required training to manage business affairs

 

To run any business entrepreneur needs investors or loans to run business. We  providing consulting for getting finance and support with required project report for loan application and also introduce with interested investors.
name: SINDHI BUSINESS NETWORKING FOUNDATION OFINDIA

idea: Globex Courier and Cargo Pvt. Ltd. is a INDIA based Business to Business (B2B) and Business to Consumer (B2C) Express Courier, Freight, and Logistics Company which has been supporting Domestic and international businesses for over the years. Globex Courier and Cargo Pvt. Ltd.. has undertaken work for the Publishing, Banking, Insurance, IT, Engineering, Pharmaceutical, Garment and any other industry. We handle every sector of Domestic and international business from the smallest firms to the largest, shipping hundreds of packages a week from documents to pallet loads efficiently, professionally and cost-effectively.
name: GLOBEX COURIER AND CARGO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: StocksEmoji is a platform that aims to fill the research gap in investment. Bringing to the market, products that support the user through discovery, decision, and follow up while investing.
name: STOCKS EMOJI ADVISORY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a H.R. Solutions company aiming to minimize the gap between industry Human resource demand and available resources.

Corporates waste lost of precious time, effort and money on identifying and validating documents of candidates and candidates lose good opportunities

due to lack of proper documentation.

We aim to ease this process by helping candidate in storing their documents required for Jobs in one place which can be accessed by corporates to make the transition smoother.

Benefits to Corporates:

1.Data Base of Genuine Candidates

2.Lesser Attrition rate

3.One stop destination for complete H.R. solution

4.Save on verification and logistics cost

5.More productivity


 Benefits to Job Seeker:

1.Free Job listing

2.Verified Jobs

3.Ease of documentation with click of button.


Website: www.adishasolutions.in
name: Adisha H.R. Solutions Private Limited
